name: Hot Sauna
description:
Hot Sauna is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will find an exciting adventure of Jack's boyfriend in the sauna. He comes there to have fun with his girlfriends. The game is filled with scenes of sex, humor and romance.
In this wonderful game you will plunge into the story of the guy Jack, who came to the sauna to fuck his girlfriends. Sarah and Sheila are two very good friends who just had sex in the sauna. They were later joined by their friend Jack. What happened next you will see in the game. Get real enjoyment from very simple gameplay and cool music.
Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!
